org.gradoop.storage.common.io

Interface FilterableDataSource<GQuery extends ElementQuery,VQuery extends ElementQuery,EQuery extends ElementQuery>

  • Type Parameters:
    GQuery - graph element filter
    VQuery - vertex element filter
    EQuery - edge element filter
    All Superinterfaces:
    DataSource

    public interface FilterableDataSource<GQuery extends ElementQuery,VQuery extends ElementQuery,EQuery extends ElementQuery>
extends DataSource
    Data source with support for filter push-down. A Source extending this interface is able to filter records such that the returned DataSet returns fewer records.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FilterableDataSource<GQuery,VQuery,EQuery> applyEdgePredicate(EQuery query)
      Returns a copy of the DataSource with added predicates.
      FilterableDataSource<GQuery,VQuery,EQuery> applyGraphPredicate(GQuery query)
      Returns a copy of the DataSource with added predicates.
      FilterableDataSource<GQuery,VQuery,EQuery> applyVertexPredicate(VQuery query)
      Returns a copy of the DataSource with added predicates.
      boolean isFilterPushedDown()
      Returns true if the apply*Predicate() method was called before.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradoop.flink.io.api.DataSource

        getGraphCollection, getLogicalGraph

    • Method Detail

      • applyGraphPredicate

        @Nonnull
FilterableDataSource<GQuery,VQuery,EQuery> applyGraphPredicate(@Nonnull
                                                                        GQuery query)
        Returns a copy of the DataSource with added predicates. The predicates parameter is a mutable list of conjunctive predicates that are “offered” to the DataSource.
        Parameters:
        query - graph head query formula
        Returns:
        a copy of the FilterableDataSource with added predicates

      • applyVertexPredicate

        @Nonnull
FilterableDataSource<GQuery,VQuery,EQuery> applyVertexPredicate(@Nonnull
                                                                         VQuery query)
        Returns a copy of the DataSource with added predicates. The predicates parameter is a mutable list of conjunctive predicates that are “offered” to the DataSource.
        Parameters:
        query - vertex query formula
        Returns:
        a copy of the FilterableDataSource with added predicates

      • applyEdgePredicate

        @Nonnull
FilterableDataSource<GQuery,VQuery,EQuery> applyEdgePredicate(@Nonnull
                                                                       EQuery query)
        Returns a copy of the DataSource with added predicates. The predicates parameter is a mutable list of conjunctive predicates that are “offered” to the DataSource.
        Parameters:
        query - edge query formula
        Returns:
        a copy of the FilterableDataSource with added predicates

      • isFilterPushedDown

        boolean isFilterPushedDown()
        Returns true if the apply*Predicate() method was called before. Hence, isFilterPushedDown() must return true for all TableSource instances returned from a applyPredicate() call.
        Returns:
        true if the apply*Predicate() method was called before
